actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to permit the exchange of five-year level premium term policies of National Service Life Insurance to special endowment at age ninety-six plans.

summary.text: Authorizes veterans aged 65 or more to exchange five-year level premium term policies of National Service Life Insurance to special endowment at age 96 plans.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to permit the exchange of five-year level premium term policies of National Service Life Insurance to special endowment at age ninety-six plans.
